demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_anomaly_detection_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - Anomaly Detection Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Anomaly Detection
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application demonstrates a model trained to detect anomalies in imu series data. The detected class (anomaly/no anomaly) is printed to the serial port.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_audio_classifier_efr32_micriumos
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Audio Classifier Micrium OS Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Audio Classifier Micrium OS
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to classify audio data recorded on the microphone in a Micrium OS kernel task. The classification is used to control a LED on the board.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_blink_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Blink Baremetal Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Blink Baremetal
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application demonstrates a model trained to replicate a sine function. The model is continuously fed with values ranging from 0 to 2pi, and the output of the model is used to control the intensity of an LED.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_data_capture_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Data Capture Baremetal Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Data Capture Baremetal
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application captures IMU sensor data and logs it to CSV format for machine learning dataset generation.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_image_classifier_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Image Classifier Baremetal Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Image Classifier Baremetal
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to classify Hand gestures captured on camera images in a Micrium OS kernel task. The classification is used to control a LED on the board.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_magic_wand_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - Magic Wand Baremetal Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Magic Wand Baremetal
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application demonstrates a model trained to recognize various hand gestures with an accelerometer. The detected gestures are printed to the serial port.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_model_profiler_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Model Profiler Baremetal Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Model Profiler Baremetal
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application profiles a ML model. The ML model is loaded as a byte array which is generated from a Tensorflow tflite model file. Profiling is performed by running one inference with the model.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_profiler_firmware_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Profiler Firmware Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Profiler Firmware
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers together with the ml_profiler component to profile machine learning models on EFR Series 2 boards.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_soc_voice_control_light_efr32_micriumos
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Voice Control Light Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Voice Control Light
Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to detect the spoken words 'on' and 'off' from audio data recorded on the microphone in a Micrium OS kernel task. The detected keywords are used to control an LED on the board.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.aiml_zigbee_soc_z3_switch_with_voice_efr32_baremetal
demo.label: AI/ML - SoC Zigbee 3.0 Switch with Voice Baremetal Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Zigbee 3.0 Switch with Voice Baremetal
Wireless\ Technology|Zigbee Device Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: Zigbee 3.0 Switch with Voice sample.
